contact.useAnyBelow: You can use any of the following methods to reach out to us:
contact.discord: <0>Join our Discord server</0> and describe your issue/idea in the <2>#support</2> channel
contact.deviantart: <0>Send a note</0> to the group on DeviantArt

lookingForTranslators.title: Translators wanted
lookingForTranslators.intro: This project is looking for volunteers to help translate this site to various languages.
lookingForTranslators.wantedLanguages: We are currently looking for native speakers to help with translations for these languages:
lookingForTranslators.howToHelp: If you are interested please get in touch via the options above. Please note that a Discord account is required so we can coordinate translation efforts.

auth.noAccountYet: No account yet? Create one here!
auth.alreadyHaveAccount: Already have an account? Sign in here!
auth.accountBenefits: An account allows you to customize the site's behavior, with many more features yet to come.
auth.name: Display Name
auth.nameHelp: Only English letters, digits, dashes and underscores. Must be between {{min}} and {{max}} characters. Can be changed later.
auth.emailHelp: Use a valid e-mail address that can receive messages to ensure you do not lose access to your account. This address must be confirmed after signing up. <1>We will not send you spam.</1>
auth.passwordHelp: Must be at least {{min}} characters long and not commonly used.
auth.rateLimited: Too many signin attempts, please try again in {{count}} second
auth.rateLimited_plural: Too many signin attempts, please try again in {{count}} seconds
auth.pwResetNotYetAvailable: The password reset feature is not available yet

validation.email: Please enter a valid e-mail address
validation.acceptPrivacyPolicy: You must accept the privacy policy
